game_description: This is the VR implementation of the classic Mahjong game No matter if you are a mahjong master or a beginner, this game will be your best choice! Creative design of solid 3D mahjong levels, simple game rules, suitable for everyone! It’s transformed from the traditional matching game and brings a relaxing experience to players in a 3D way. Be the master and pair all the cubes to eliminate them on over 30 levels! Game features: - Classic and 3D style levels. - Rotate, move and zoom the board. - It’s a simple puzzle game which is suitable for any age group.
review_1: Needs adjustments to height in sitting mode More than one style of artwork for tiles and scenery All in all I like Mahjong and this could be very visually satisfying if some effort is put in. There isn't but so many ways to play the original game, a little more work an a update I will come back an review again.
